summary: Defines a structured template that encapsulates all information about a single dialogue turn, including user and system utterances, system actions, annotated intent and slot labels, their character positions, possible label vocabularies, and human‑readable descriptions. It serves as a non‑instantiable descriptor used through a base dialogue example class for preparing and handling dialogue data.
business_intent: Facilitate the organization and annotation of dialogue datasets to train and evaluate natural language understanding components of conversational AI systems.
